name: Martin Vinæs Larsen
body:
---------------------------------------        [CV](martinvinaes.github.io/cv/resume.pdf)        [Contact](#contact)        [Research](#contact)        [Contact](#contact)        [Writing](#contact) --------------------------------------- ## Hello! I am a Graduate Student in the [Department of Political Science](http://www.polsci.ku.dk/) at the University of Copenhagen, finishing my disseration on electoral accountability and economic voting. I recently visited the [Chair in Electoral Studies](http://www.chairelectoral.com/) at the University of Montreal. *** My primary field of interest is in comparative political behavior, with a focus on electoral accountability and the quality of voter decision-making. In addition to this I am also interested in the role of information in EU elections. Some of my research is published or forthcoming in the *Political Science Research and Methods*, *Electoral Studies* and *Journal of Common Market Studies*, and has been featured in a number of Danish News mida outlets. In addition to research I do a fair bit of writing on the intersection between policy and political science research. Primarily in Danish. Recently I have had op-eds in Berlingske, Politiken and Ræson.
